game.name: SIGNAL LOST
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A short horror game where you keep a spacecraft operational as it reaches Venus by completing tasks and repairs.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A short horror game where you keep a spacecraft operational as it reaches Venus by completing tasks and repairs.
